# R3 High PR Template

## Summary
- RUN_ID:
- Agent:
- Objective:
- What changed:
- Why:

## Risk
- [x] R3 High (`risk:R3-high`)
- Rationale:
- Security/PII considerations:

## Gates (required)
- CI validate: REQUIRED
- Codecov patch + project target: REQUIRED
- Bugbot: REQUIRED + rerun if stale
- Claude semantic review: REQUIRED + security prompt
- E2E: REQUIRED if outbound/automation/integration changes

## Evidence
- CI run link:
- Codecov statuses:
- Bugbot comment link + triage:
- Claude links + verdicts:
- E2E evidence link:
- Rollback plan:
- Post-merge verification plan:
